label: player.get_health()
description: Returns the player's current health as a number. Takes no arguments.

label: player.heal([])
description: Heals the player by a specified amount. Takes 1 argument: a number.

label: player.take_damage([])
description: Inflicts damage to the player. Takes 1 argument: a number.

label: player.has_status("burning")
description: Checks if the player has a specific status effect. Returns true or false. Takes 1 argument: a status name string.

label: player.get_status_duration("burning")
description: Returns the remaining duration of a status effect on the player. Takes 1 argument: a status name string.

label: target.take_damage([])
description: Deals a specified amount of damage to the target. Takes 1 argument: a number.

label: target.apply_status("burning")
description: Applies a status effect to the target. Takes 1 argument: a status name string.

label: target.knockback([])
description: Pushes the target away with a given force. Takes 1 argument: a number representing strength.

label: if([], [])
description: Executes the second expression if the first condition is true. Takes 2 arguments: a condition (boolean) and a result expression.

label: equals([], [])
description: Compares two values for equality. Returns true or false. Takes 2 arguments: any two comparable values.

label: greater_than([], [])
description: Checks if the first value is greater than the second. Returns true or false. Takes 2 arguments: two numbers.

label: add([], [])
description: Adds two numbers together. Returns a number. Takes 2 arguments: two numbers.

label: const(5)
description: Represents the constant number 5. Returns the number 5. Takes no arguments.

label: const(1)
description: Represents the constant number 1. Returns the number 1. Takes no arguments.
